functions.tag: {pages:['{"text":"Reinforcement of the Flicia Shield:\\n\\n1x Flicia Shield\\n64x Phantom Membranes\\n1x Netherite Ingot\\n1x Smithing Hammer\\n\\nAll materials need to be put together on a smithing table."}'],title:"Reinforcement - Flicia Shield",author:unknown,generation:1,display:{Lore:["Flicia Shield of Levitation"]}}
